name: com.trytalo.talo
description:
Talo (https://trytalo.com) is an open-source game backend with services designed to help you build games faster. You can currently:

- Identify players
- Store persistent data across players
- Track events (levelling up, finding loot, etc)
- Display high scores with leaderboards
- Store and load player saves
- Load game config options and flags from the cloud

samples.description: A simple UI-based playground, allowing you to test identifying, events, stats and leaderboards
A basic saves UI, allowing you to load, create and update saves
